name: Supreme Leader Defense
description:
Drag mouse (hold left click and move) to aim.

Press Space to Fire.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

North Korea made an attack with a virus to Pyeongchang!

The biochemical weapon is known as virus No. 1.
The weapon is infecting citizens and making them to supreme-zombies, attacking Korea!

Can you protect Korea from supreme-zombies that crossing over the Red Line?

■■■ Game Tips ■■■

■ Earn 2x score when zombies are killed over the yellow line.

■ Earn 3x score when zombies are killed over the red-line!
